analytics-last-30-days: Dropdown option to limit data to the last 30 days.
analytics-last-90-days: Dropdown option to limit data to the last 90 days.
analytics-last-365-days: Dropdown option to limit data to the last 365 days.
analytics-all-time: Dropdown option to not limit data by date.
analytics-daily: Dropdown option to group results by day.
analytics-monthly: Dropdown option to group results by month.
analytics-filter: Placeholder to limit data to a specific page or category.
analytics-no-data: Error message when no data is found.
analytics-views: Section title for the data regarding page views.
analytics-edits: Section title for the data regarding edits.
analytics-editors: Section title for the data regarding editors.
analytics-total: Description term for the total number of views, edits or editors
analytics-average: Description term for the average number of views, edits or editors
analytics-top-editors: Section title for the data regarding top editors.
analytics-top-editors-user: Table header for the user names column of the top editors table.
analytics-top-editors-edits: Table header for the edit count column of the top editors table.
